name: Married Woman Hypnosis Counseling
description:
Subtitles in the game are only available in Japanese.

Game Synopsis


Masanori Narita is a charismatic doctor and counselor who has seen a sudden rise in popularity.
His work centers around patients who are having problems with their sex lives.
These patients, seeking a fix for these issues, secretly go to his clinic.
Under the guise of treatment, he spends his days having sex to his heart's content.
His treatment includes making use of hypnosis, so his patients barely remember what has occurred.
And today, another such patient pays a visit to his clinic!

Story

This clinic's scheduled is fully booked with female patients every day.
The doctor-in-charge and the main character, Masanori Narita, is a man with average looks.
However, his reputation for being articulate and capable has spread by word-of-mouth, and he now enjoys a surge in popularity as a charismatic counselor.
He mainly deals with patients who have issues related to sex.
They often have troubles related to their partners and are bothered by the fact that they cannot enjoy the sex they have.
These patients, hoping to solve these issues, secretly go to his clinic.

However, on rare occasions, some go mad from their desires and divorce their partners or cheat on them.
And today, yet another patient pays a visit to his clinic!
